Reviews.Title: “A conference centre. Full stop.”

Reviews.Content: stayed conference 2000 guests staff struggling deliver retrospect am struggling write positive review strengths hotel fairly newly renovated nice futuristic lobby equipped host events limit checked guest checked time happened hours occupied checked complained ventilation cold told window sun hard attending conference day raining supportive helping restaurant alternatives hotel exciting couple tries inside fairly isolated establishment hotel addition service slow nonchalant poor terms english summary tourist avoid hotel business looking hold conference consider offer

Reviews.Title: “Better than reviews suggest but some problems”
Reviews.Author: MMmd
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel days february attending conference experience tripadvisor reviews suggest bed relatively clean potentially wireless internet person 20 wired access conference communal wifi unfortunately factors hopefully rectified airconditioning surprisingly february hot cooled balcony door air conditioning 5c pumped hot air telephone time realise wake call happen safe locked position minibar poorly stocked shower bathtub filled water despite exit flow 10min water empty coming conference hotel feel experience tourist probably hotel nearer city centre

Reviews.Content: stayed occasions months sometimes nights times week impersonal convention hotel theres size outdoor swimming pool september nice bar nearby obviously none available season bedrooms ok theres musty aroma nasty nice restaurants impersonal food variable quality utterly horrid reviewer noted surrounding fairly urban nice restaurants 15 minute walk especially josephs check reviews essence conference workrelated reason look elsewhere leisure break

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for a night or two!”
Reviews.Author: venicefan
Reviews.Content: friend stayed coach tour cosmos summer average hotel wouldnt rated 4 star 2 3 comfortable reasonably quiet location outside city centre public rome didnt breakfast morning believe tour guides fault didnt alarm call breakfast morning little disappointing little choice eats stayed june 2000 earlier date range mentioned believe reviews matter

Reviews.Title: “If you need a large convention hotel...”
Reviews.Author: LeadingWomen
Reviews.Content: nights 1000 person conference loved wine lunch enjoyed sitting spacious bright lobby wifi catering staff careful prepare pasta perfection slightly rushed lunch waited conference attendees seated breakfast buffet varied meeting conference conference friendly beautiful outdoor pool book conference rome definitely tourist id look cozy bb character walk main street theres gem seafood restaurant nice break conference food

Reviews.Title: “Seminar hotel, food quality terrible”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel seminar 3 days hotel located little bit centre takes 10 minutes centre taxi hotel average food quality low breakfast poor lunch dinner poor service quality restaurant poor waiters smiling pissed serve people reccommend hotel reception terrible ready 1400 checked
